DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the effect of hand massage, switched on diathermy or sham/switched off diathermy on DOMS in a group of athletes suffering DOMS after a ski mountaineering race.
DOC.brief_title: Diathermy Compared With Sham Diathermy in Doms Management
DOC.detailed_description: This study examine DOMS in athletes following a ski mountaineering race, pain measured with numbering pain rating scale NPRS and perceived global improvement (PGIC) after treatment have been measured after a massage treatment, a diathermy treatment and a sham diathermy treatment.
DOC.criteria: Healthy patients who complaints about D.O.M.S. after a skimountaneering race Patient who complain of pathology such trauma or declaring consuming drugs for pain management where excluded from the study.
